card.title: Description
card.content:
With this panel you can ...
- display a selection of atoms as sticks. - hide the sticks representation of a selection of atoms. - show all disulfid-bonds of the protein. - zoom a selection of atoms.

guide.title: Open Protein Regions panel on the Proteins tab

steps.step: Select a protein from the tree.
Click on :google_material-open_in_new_w200:, to load the pymol session of the selected protein.
Under the _Hotspots_ menu, click on **Protein Regions**.
The _Protein Regions_ panel appears under the tree.

guide.title: Show an atom selection as sticks on the Proteins tab

steps.step: Select a protein from the tree.
Click on :google_material-open_in_new_w200:, to load the pymol session of the selected protein.
Under the _Hotspots_ menu, click on **Protein Regions**.
The _Protein Regions_ panel appears under the tree.
Click on the atoms in PyMOL's sequence view that should be displayed as sticks.
Click in the _Protein Regions_ panel on **Show** besides _Sticks_.

details.item: The zoom is fixed at a certain distance from the selection. If the protein is small, the zoom may be too small.
